text: eeta passesome ayiya eyage wadasatahanakata mata aaradhanawak karala api denna 'denuwara minpasu eka nuwarak weyi..'

danatamath piri athi rajya wishwa widyala, thawa thawath sankhyathmakawa wadi kirima sandaha shakthiya saha mudalhadal nasthi karanawa wenuwata, danata aanduwa kala yuththe eewaye gunathmaka bhawaya jathyanthara mattamata gena eema sandaha aayojanaya kirimayi.

sinahawath kandulath athara mirikena jiwithaya thada wadi kamata iri giyeya.mahanna widihak, mahanna kramayak, mahanna aampanna nathi welawe mata thotupala ee hama deyakma kiya dunna, â€œirichcha jiwithaya mahanna oona, irichcha thanin misa ee kotasa kapa iwath kara noweâ€ yayi thotupala mata kiwwe katath nasena paridiya.thotupalen labunu pannarayen mama dan tika tika jiwithaya mahanawa, jiwithaya mahanakam mata inna hitinnata dun mage gini gath hadawatha niwu thotupalata mama sada nayagathiyi.

sinhala ho wewa,muslim ho damila ho wewa,owun me rate purawasiyanmaya.owunge chanda walangu piligath chandamaya.pahadiliwama methana siduwi thibenne rajapaksha palanaye thibu pradhana durwalatha wana dushanayata ha jathiwadayata wiruddhawa minisun eekarashi wima pamani.ethanadi palana kalapayan wenkaraganima udesa dun chandyayi kawareku ho laghu kirim piligatha nohaki thakathiru kamaki.me rate palana kalapa ho wenama rajyan sadaha wayyawasthawen idak labadi nomatha.ee sadahada 5/6 balayak awashya we.mewan thathwayak uda ee karuna udesa eya dina ganimata kisima awasthawak lankiya deshapalana pakshayakata laba gatha nohaka.korahe kibullu daka udawi athi awasthawa hallu nokaranna.
